game.name: Rival Rush
game.description:
Are you a racing game enthusiast? If so, Rival Rash Game is designed just for you, in order to help you reach the top level of the racing world. This free online car racing game is a treat to all those who love to breeze through the traffic racing tracks while beating their opponents.

Remember, 3 lives are given to you when it comes to completing this new racing game. All you need to do is drive safely on the road while avoiding other cars running around you. They would try to overtake you, so be careful and make the smart move to win this game.

Based on HTML 5, Rival Rush is a cool racing game featured with high-quality graphics. The high traffic of the game makes sure that you have to face many unexpected challenges to earn the crown of an expert Rival Rush Driver. Open your eyes while squeezing through the moving cars and keep on riding for as long as you cant to score higher in this flash racing game.

One of the best car racing games to play, Rival Rush comes with a platform where you have to run without being crashed with other moving cars. By just reaching the finish line of each level, you will be forwarded to the next level of this free online game. Good concentration along with good driving skills would help to navigate your way through the busy road at terrifying speed and avoid accidents. Play Rival Rush using your mouse, iPad, tablet, mobile phones or iPhone.

Game Instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive. No specific instructions needed.
Have fun and enjoy the game! 🙂
